title: Scp 8642 8
content:
You inform Hannah that you don’t have any more questions for her. “Oh, Ok! I’ll leave you to it then!” Hannah’s enthusiasm doesn’t seem affected by your lack of questions. “You can have a seat at the table over there and wait for Greg to be done!” And then in what can only be described as a whirlwind of papers, Hannah disappears somewhere into the maze of filing cabinets, leaving you utterly perplexed about this entire department. You consider your options. Sitting and waiting for Greg to give you your information would be all that’s expected of you, but something feels off about this department. You could stealthily investigate some papers or Greg's computer to see if you can piece together what’s going on. On the one hand, your job only requires you to gather financial information; on the other hand, knowing more about this department would help you understand its finances AND satisfy your burning curiosity. After thinking it over, you decide to…

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/9 Sit and wait.]||= 8||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/34 Investigate.]||

author: TopHatBionicle
